title: Person Role
description: A qualified association between a Person or OrganisationalUnit and an entity such as an ObjectGroup or MeasurementOrFact that enables the relationship to be contextualised with a specific role and time period.

role.description: A role played by a Person in the context of an entity such as an ObjectGroup, OrganisationalUnit or RecordLevel.

startedAtTime.description: The date or time when a Person started fulfilling the role specified in the role property.

endedAtTime.description: The date or time when a Person stopped fulfilling the role specified in the role property.

person.description: One or more Persons relating to the Person Role

address.description: One or more Addresses relating to the Person Role

contactDetail.description: One or more Contact Details relating to the Person Role

identifier.description: One or more Identifiers relating to the Person Role

reference.description: One or more References relating to the Person Role

temporalCoverage.description: One or more TemporalCoverages relating to the Person Role
